title: Ready to lease! 2 bed 2 bath home. Check us out!
posting_body: ['Park Place Northville - A place to call home!', 'Bed: 2 / Bath: 2', 'Sq.', 'Footage: 1080 sq ft', 'Rent: $1705 - $1978/Month', 'Terms: 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month', 'show contact info', 'YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', 'With easy access to Main Street and Northville Road, Park Place is just minutes away from all of the shopping, dining, and entertainment that Northville has to offer.', 'We are near Twelve Oaks Mall, Meadowbrook Country Club, and Downtown Northville where you can eat or shop or visit historical landmarks.', "Also nearby is Laurel Park Place, AMC Livonia 20, and Parmenter's Northville Cider Mill.", 'In addition, Park Place at Northville is also located in close proximity to some of the top ranked schools within the state.', 'Silver Springs Elementary, Hillside Middle School, and Northville High School all make up schools within our district.', 'Our Apartment Homes Feature:', '❖ Built-in Microwave', '❖ Cathedral Ceilings On Second Floor', '❖ Central Air', '❖ Granite Upgrade (Premium Units Only)', '❖ High Speed Internet Access', '❖ Lake Views (Select Units)', '❖ Private Balcony or Patio', '❖ Range', '❖ Stainless Steel Appliances', '❖ Walk-In Closets', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '❖ 24 Hour Fitness Gym', '❖ Business Center', '❖ Clubhouse', '❖ Laundry Facilities', '❖ On-Site Maintenance', '❖ Sundeck', '❖ Swimming Pool', '❖ Tennis Court', '❖ Volleyball Court', '❖ Wifi-Cafe', '❖ Center Sidewalks Throughout', '❖ Close to Downtown Northville', '❖ Concierge', '❖ House Plant Watering Service', '❖ Lush Landscaping', '❖ Luxury Building', '❖ Minutes from shopping, dining, and entertainment', '❖ Package Receiving', '❖ Pets Allowed', '❖ Smoke-Free', 'Contact Info:', 'show contact info', '43001 Northville Place Dr', 'Northville, MI 48167', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 7:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Pets:', 'We are extremely pet-friendly, however, dogs are only allowed in Buildings 1 through 10!', 'Also, we even have "While Away" pet care!', 'Pet rent is $30 per pet.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '699CA7DB5DBD42E']
